programme.title: Rallycross 2024
programme.desc: Παρακολουθήστε την 11η χρονιά FIA World Rallycross Championship, της κορυφαίας κατηγορίας διεθνών αγώνων αυτοκινήτου. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Βασιλείου.

programme.title: Rallycross 2024
programme.desc: Ουγγαρία IΙ, World RX Semifinal & Final. Παρακολουθήστε την 11η χρονιά FIA World Rallycross Championship, της κορυφαίας κατηγορίας διεθνών αγώνων αυτοκινήτου. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Βασιλείου.

programme.title: WRC Μαγκαζίνο 2024
programme.desc: Ενημερωθείτε για τα τελευταία νέα, τα αποτελέσματα, τη βαθμολογία, τις αλλαγές στο πρόγραμμα και τις καλύτερες στιγμές από κάθε ράλι.

programme.title: MotoGP 2024 - Στιγμιότυπα
programme.desc: Το MotoGP, το παγκόσμιο πρωτάθλημα μοτοσυκλέτας, προσφέρει πολλές συγκινήσεις. Παρακολουθήστε μια συμπυκνωμένη εκδοχή όσων συνέβησαν σε μια από τις κούρσες του 2024.

programme.title: MotoGP 2024 - Στιγμιότυπα
programme.desc: Το MotoGP, το παγκόσμιο πρωτάθλημα μοτοσυκλέτας, προσφέρει πολλές συγκινήσεις. Παρακολουθήστε μια συμπυκνωμένη εκδοχή όσων συνέβησαν σε μια από τις κούρσες του 2024.

programme.title: There Can Be Only One
programme.desc: Συνδυάζοντας παρασκήνια και προηγουμένως αθέατα πλάνα, αυτό το τετραμερές ντοκιμαντέρ ακολουθεί 5 βασικούς διεκδικητές που αγωνίζονται για το στέμμα του Παγκοσμίου Πρωταθλήματος MotoGP 2022, από την προετοιμασία μέχρι το συναρπαστικό φινάλε της σεζόν στη Βαλένθια.

programme.title: WRC Μαγκαζίνο 2024
programme.desc: Ενημερωθείτε για τα τελευταία νέα, τα αποτελέσματα, τη βαθμολογία, τις αλλαγές στο πρόγραμμα και τις καλύτερες στιγμές από κάθε ράλι.

programme.title: Sports Classics: 2024 Sports Rundown
programme.desc: Ένα συναρπαστικό ταξίδι σε αρένες, γήπεδα, γυμναστήρια και χώρους σε όλο τον κόσμο, όπου αντηχούν οι παλμοί της καρδιάς των αθλημάτων. Οι αθλητές βάζουν τα πάντα σε κάθε άθλημα, αλλά έχετε αναρωτηθεί ποτέ για το άτομο που κρύβεται πίσω από τον αθλητή;.

programme.title: ATP 500 2024 - Στιγμιότυπα
programme.desc: Παρακολουθήστε τα στιγμιότυπα των κυριότερων αγώνων των τουρνουά ATP 500, που ανήκουν στην 4η βαθμίδα των ετήσιων διοργανώσεων τένις σε επίπεδο ανδρών.

programme.title: Τένις: ATP 250 2024
programme.desc: Ατλάντα. Τελικός. Το ATP Tour 250 είναι η χαμηλότερη βαθμίδα στα τουρνουά τένις ανδρών στο κυρίως ATP Tour. Περιγραφή: Μαρίζα Γεωργίτση.

programme.title: Sports Classics: The Outdoor Sports Show 2024
programme.desc: Αυτή η σειρά παρουσιάζει ένα ευρύ φάσμα υπαίθριων σπορ καθώς και τους αθλητές που αγωνίζονται σε αυτά. Η εκπομπή καλύπτει από επαγγελματικά και ψυχαγωγικά έως και extreme sports, όπως αγώνες μαραθωνίου, αναρρίχηση, σκι, σέρφινγκ, πεζοπορία, τρίαθλο, ιστιοπλοΐα και ποδηλασία.

programme.title: ATP 500 2024 - Στιγμιότυπα
programme.desc: Παρακολουθήστε τα στιγμιότυπα των κυριότερων αγώνων των τουρνουά ATP 500, που ανήκουν στην 4η βαθμίδα των ετήσιων διοργανώσεων τένις σε επίπεδο ανδρών.

programme.title: ATP Masters 1000 2024 - Στιγμιότυπα
programme.desc: Παρακολουθήστε τα στιγμιότυπα των κυριότερων αγώνων των τουρνουά ATP 1000, στα οποία συμμετέχουν οι κορυφαίοι της κατάταξης στο ATP Tour.

programme.title: Στίβος: World Athletics Continental Tour Gold 2024
programme.desc: Η ετήσια σειρά μίτινγκ στίβου αποτελεί τη δεύτερη τη τάξει διοργάνωση μετά το Diamond League και το πρώτο «μονοπάτι» για τους αθλητές προς τις μεγάλες διοργανώσεις του κλασικού αθλητισμού, με συνολικά 12 events σε 4 ηπείρους. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Βασιλείου.

programme.title: Sports Classics: 2024 Sports Rundown
programme.desc: Ένα συναρπαστικό ταξίδι σε αρένες, γήπεδα, γυμναστήρια και χώρους σε όλο τον κόσμο, όπου αντηχούν οι παλμοί της καρδιάς των αθλημάτων. Οι αθλητές βάζουν τα πάντα σε κάθε άθλημα, αλλά έχετε αναρωτηθεί ποτέ για το άτομο που κρύβεται πίσω από τον αθλητή;.

programme.title: Πάντελ: Premier Padel Tour 2024
programme.desc: Μάλαγα. Τελικός Γυναικών. Το Premier Padel είναι η μόνη διοργάνωση που προσφέρει επίσημους πόντους κατάταξης στους παίκτες και τα τουρνουά P1 απονέμουν στους νικητές 1000 πόντους κι ένα μεγάλο χρηματικό έπαθλο. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Βασιλείου.

programme.title: Υδάτινα Σπορ: Ο Κόσμος της Ιστιοπλοΐας 2024
programme.desc: Η ιστιοπλοΐα είναι ένα πολύ ξεχωριστό άθλημα. Η εκπομπή παρουσιάζει την καρδιά της ιστιοπλοΐας, από την κομψότητα και το πρεστίζ των εκπληκτικών γιοτ μέχρι την αντοχή που χρειάζεται στους αγώνες και τον σκληρό κόσμο των αγώνων dinghy και του kite surfing.

programme.title: Υδάτινα Σπορ: Sailing to the Games 2024
programme.desc: Ακολουθήστε ιστιοπλόους από όλο τον κόσμο καθώς προετοιμάζονται να αγωνιστούν στη μεγαλύτερη αθλητική σκηνή του κόσμου.

programme.title: Τένις: ATP 500 2024
programme.desc: Ουάσινγκτον. Κυρίως ταμπλό. Τα τουρνουά ATP 500 ανήκουν στην 4η βαθμίδα των ετήσιων διοργανώσεων τένις σε επίπεδο ανδρών. Η σειρά αυτή αποτελείται από 13 τουρνουά, με τον νικητή σε καθένα από αυτά να λαμβάνει 500 πόντους κατάταξης. Περιγραφή: Μαρίζα Γεωργίτση.

programme.title: America's Funniest Home Videos
programme.desc: Influencers encounter hilarious mishaps; a vlogger accidentally swallows a bug midsentence; birthday blunders; a man and his dogs narrowly dodge a bear on the chase.

programme.title: The Mighty Ducks
programme.desc: After reckless young lawyer Gordon Bombay (Emilio Estevez) gets arrested for drunk driving, he must coach a kids hockey team for his community service. Gordon has experience on the ice, but isn't eager to return to hockey, a point hit home by his tense dealings with his own former coach, Jack Reilly (Lane Smith). The reluctant Gordon eventually grows to appreciate his team, which includes promising young Charlie Conway (Joshua Jackson), and leads them to take on Reilly's tough players.

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Officer John Nolan's mom makes an unannounced visit, which complicates his life; Sgt. Grey considers retiring.

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Officer Jackson West's relationship with his new training officer, Stanton, escalates, and he begins to work with Sgt. Grey to find a solution.

programme.title: Murdoch Mysteries
programme.desc: Murdoch's son Harry is visiting from boarding school when he and Ogden are abducted by a nefarious, vengeful foe.

programme.title: This Week With George Stephanopoulos
programme.desc: Maryland Gov. Wes Moore (D); Illinois Gov. J.B. Pritzker (D); New Hampshire Gov. Chris Sununu (R); roundtable with Donna Brazile, Marc Lotter, Asma Khalid and Laura Barrón-López.

programme.title: America This Morning
programme.desc: The early-morning news program offers the latest news, business, weather, and sports reports of the day, along with trending stories and new viral videos. Mona Kosar and Andrew Dymburt are the latest in the line of accomplished journalists who have hosted the pre-dawn broadcast that covers breaking news from around the world and across the country.

programme.desc: News coverage to start the day.

programme.desc: TV personality Bernadette Peters; Hong Chau ("The Instigators"); Fitz and The Tantrums perform.

programme.title: The View

programme.title: Tamron Hall
programme.desc: U.S. Surgeon General Dr. Vivek Murthy says loneliness is such a major health problem that it puts people at risk of premature death as much as smoking every day.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: Get Up

Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Live: First Take

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali in the ESPN studio and joined via satellite by four panelists from across the country, the team debates popular sports stories. Reali acts as moderator, giving points for well-made arguments and deducting points for those who inspire him to hit the "mute" button. At the end of the show, whomever Reali deems the winner has 30 seconds without interruption to voice their final opinions on any topic they want.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith joins host Molly Qerim on this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: Fantasy Focus
programme.desc: Field Yates hosts ESPN's top Fantasy Football experts for a daily discussion of rankings, injuries and game previews and debate how the biggest NFL stories impact Fantasy Football.

programme.title: Live: College Football Live
programme.desc: Want to know up-to-the-minute reports about your favorite college football team? ESPN has it covered with this weekday studio show, a roundtable format that emphasizes discussion and opinions on the sport's biggest stories and newsmakers. The half-hour program features a rotating roster of analysts that includes coaches, former players, and media personalities.

programme.title: College Football Live
programme.desc: Want to know up-to-the-minute reports about your favorite college football team? ESPN has it covered with this weekday studio show, a roundtable format that emphasizes discussion and opinions on the sport's biggest stories and newsmakers. The half-hour program features a rotating roster of analysts that includes coaches, former players, and media personalities.

programme.title: Live: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali in the ESPN studio and joined via satellite by four panelists from across the country, the team debates popular sports stories. Reali acts as moderator, giving points for well-made arguments and deducting points for those who inspire him to hit the "mute" button. At the end of the show, whomever Reali deems the winner has 30 seconds without interruption to voice their final opinions on any topic they want.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.desc: ESPN Sports Betting Analysts Erin Dolan and Joe Fortenbaugh, along with host Tyler Fulghum, break down the biggest storylines through the lens of sports betting, with breakdowns, discussions and picks.

programme.desc: Adrift in space with no food or water, Tony Stark sends a message to Pepper Potts as his oxygen supply starts to dwindle. Meanwhile, the remaining Avengers -- Thor, Black Widow, Captain America and Bruce Banner -- must figure out a way to bring back their vanquished allies for an epic showdown with Thanos -- the evil demigod who decimated the planet and the universe.

programme.desc: A young Bruce Wayne (Christian Bale) travels to the Far East, where he's trained in the martial arts by Henri Ducard (Liam Neeson), a member of the mysterious League of Shadows. When Ducard reveals the League's true purpose -- the complete destruction of Gotham City -- Wayne returns to Gotham intent on cleaning up the city without resorting to murder. With the help of Alfred (Michael Caine), his loyal butler, and Lucius Fox (Morgan Freeman), a tech expert at Wayne Enterprises, Batman is born.

Indebted to the gangster Dryden Vos, the crew devises a daring plan to travel to the mining planet Kessel to steal a batch of valuable coaxium. In need of a fast ship, Solo meets Lando Calrissian, the suave owner of the perfect vessel for the dangerous mission -- the Millennium Falcon.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When Henry gets too involved in her magical world, Paige begins to realize the difficulties of dating a mortal; Billie finds her missing sister, Christy (Marnette Patterson), whom demons have held captive for years.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Piper organizes an engagement party for Paige and Henry, but the couple begin to get cold feet.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Phoebe goes on a journey through her past loves to try to revive her excitement for romance; a group of magical teens comes to the manor seeking refuge from demons.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Coop realizes that he has fallen for Phoebe, but she yearns to be with a mortal; Piper tracks down killer demons.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean and Sam are surprised when they learn that Krissy Chambers was involved in some recent vampire deaths.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: A terrified Kevin calls Sam and Dean after he hears Crowley's voice in his head; after Dean receives a visit from Naomi, he realizes he needs to ask Benny for a favor.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean asks Sam to stop hunting until he recovers from the second trial; when a hacker (Felicia Day) stumbles upon a case, Dean teaches her how to be a hunter.

programme.title: Avengers: Endgame
programme.desc: Adrift in space with no food or water, Tony Stark sends a message to Pepper Potts as his oxygen supply starts to dwindle. Meanwhile, the remaining Avengers -- Thor, Black Widow, Captain America and Bruce Banner -- must figure out a way to bring back their vanquished allies for an epic showdown with Thanos -- the evil demigod who decimated the planet and the universe.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: A young Bruce Wayne (Christian Bale) travels to the Far East, where he's trained in the martial arts by Henri Ducard (Liam Neeson), a member of the mysterious League of Shadows. When Ducard reveals the League's true purpose -- the complete destruction of Gotham City -- Wayne returns to Gotham intent on cleaning up the city without resorting to murder. With the help of Alfred (Michael Caine), his loyal butler, and Lucius Fox (Morgan Freeman), a tech expert at Wayne Enterprises, Batman is born.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: It has been eight years since Batman (Christian Bale), in collusion with Commissioner Gordon (Gary Oldman), vanished into the night. Assuming responsibility for the death of Harvey Dent, Batman sacrificed everything for what he and Gordon hoped would be the greater good. However, the arrival of a cunning cat burglar (Anne Hathaway) and a merciless terrorist named Bane (Tom Hardy) force Batman out of exile and into a battle he may not be able to win.

programme.title: Rich & Shameless
programme.desc: Cuban baseball star, Yasiel Puig, took major league baseball by storm. He became the face of the Dodgers. This is the story of his journey to the MLB. Cuban smugglers, mexican drug cartels, hostages, shootouts, big money deals and betrayals.

programme.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: Young Han Solo finds adventure when he joins forces with a gang of galactic smugglers and a 190-year-old Wookie named Chewbacca. Indebted to the gangster Dryden Vos, the crew devises a daring plan to travel to the mining planet Kessel to steal a batch of valuable coaxium. In need of a fast ship, Solo meets Lando Calrissian, the suave owner of the perfect vessel for the dangerous mission -- the Millennium Falcon.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: New evidence confirms that a popular deaf teen was murdered in 2006, prompting the team to launch a search for the boy's body and his killer.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Lilly and Valens go to West Virginia to retrieve a suspect for the presumed homicide of a woman who was abducted from the parking lot outside her engagement party.

programme.title: Cold Case

programme.title: Charmed

programme.title: Charmed
